Module jBomberman
Package model

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
model.GameModel
public class GameModel extends Observable
Game Model is the main actor of the application. Contains conditional values ​​that govern information flow and thread generation. It holds all the information that is necessary to retain in compliance with the MVC pattern. Its fields are modified by the Controller who uses its methods. Changing its fields can trigger collateral responses in the view. In fact, as an observable it notifies its observers about some changes in its data.

    • removeAccount

      public void removeAccount(Account a)
      Remove an account from Game Model's accounts and set its next account as current Account. Then transmit the update GameModel's accounts to observers. You can't remove Default account.
      Parameters:
      a - account to remove

    • exportSaveFile

      public void exportSaveFile(File f) throws IOException
      Save accounts in a File with Serialization
      Parameters:
      f - file in which save the accounts' array
      Throws:
      IOException - from working with file stream

    • importSavedFile

      public void importSavedFile(File f) throws IOException
      Load a save with Serialization. It deletes old accounts. In the end update observers with new accounts
      Parameters:
      f - file from which load the accounts' array
      Throws:
      IOException - from working with file stream
